alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:15PM MDT until July 06 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Johnson County in north central Wyoming... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 313 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles southwest of Powder River Rest Area, which is also 25 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Johnson County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
